citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
This research facility has a new part-time Attending Veterinarian (AV) as of 8/26/22. The new AV attended the last IACUC
meeting that was held in September 2022, but there is not yet a written Program of Veterinary Care from the new
Attending Veterinarian.
Per this Section, each research facility shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a
part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of
veterinary care that contains information regarding the medical care for the animals. Correct by 2/1/23.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.33(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
This research facility has a new part-time Attending Veterinarian (AV) as of 8/26/22. The new AV attended the last IACUC 
meeting that was held in September 2022, but there is not yet a written Program of Veterinary Care from the new 
Attending Veterinarian. 
 
Per this Section, each research facility shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a 
part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of 
veterinary care that contains information regarding the medical care for the animals. Correct by 2/1/23. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
